title: Pet-friendly, Secure bike parking, Music room
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 912.0 Sq.
The Eddy is located along the waterfront in East Boston, boasting unrivaled views of the Boston skyline and within walking distance to an eclectic mix of restaurants, shops and entertainment.
The Eddy is transit-oriented and serves as a bridge between Boston's most vibrant neighborhoods.
Pricing and availability subject to change.
Locally-sourced and recycled-content materials, Well-designed living spaces, High-efficiency LED lighting, Nest Learning Thermostats™, Energy Star-rated appliances, Low-flow fixtures

Well-served by transit through the blue line, an expanded water taxi station, highways and Logan Airport, Private conference rooms, Access to boat landing, Pet-friendly, Sun deck, Pool, Direct access to Lo Presti Park, Fireplace, Grilling stations, Dog wash, Access to a new waterfront park, Lounge with a chef's kitchen, Waterfront property with uninterrupted views of the Boston Harbor and city skyline, Bike maintenance facilities, On-site restaurant with indoor and outdoor dining spaces, Secure bike parking, Outdoor terrace, Car sharing options, Music room, Modern fitness facilities, Rooftop deck with seating and 270° views, Poolside restaurant service for residents
